subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] quickspelling question
msgSnippet: Hello Alex, I would use charater #31 I for the i sound in write and right. Yes I hear also two simple S sounds in Science . Chuck Peck Alexander Lampros
messageBody:
Hello Alex,
 
I would use charater #31 I for the i sound in write and right.
 
Yes I hear also two simple "S" sounds in "Science".

Chuck Peck


Alexander Lampros <lamproswc@...> wrote:
Hey,

Trying to learn quickscript and I had a couple of
quick spelling questions. 

"Write/right": I can't figure out which one of the
many i/e sounds to use.  None of them really seem to
work. 

"Science":  Two simple S's? 

Cool alphabet, its been fun to learn.  Its definitily
much faster to write, but so far I'm finding it not
quite as evocative as Roman letters.  Maybe once I get
used to it.

Alex
